Computing Facilities
The Computer Center provides computing facilities for Faculty, Staff members, and Students to access internal resources, use application software.

User may ask for the following available facilities by sending email to support_cc@iitj.ac.in. Access to IIT Jodhpur licensed software like Microsoft 365, Matlab, Mathematica, Cadence, Mentor-Graphics, Ansys, PSCAD, Solidworks, and orCad for its academic and research purposes.
Two lab with capacity of 100 and 60 computer terminals running on Windows and GNU/Linux operating systems.
High Performance Computing (HPC) cluster for scientific research.

Address
Digital Infrastructure & AutomationComputer Center,Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur,NH 62 Nagaur Road, Karwar 342030,Jodhpur District
